data.name: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. The Wall Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The beautiful soundtrack to Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life Chapter 2: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. The Wall composed by Isaiah Prewitt.
Includes 13 original songs featured in the game.
data.about_the_game:
The beautiful soundtrack to Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life Chapter 2: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. The Wall composed by Isaiah Prewitt.
Includes 13 original songs featured in the game.
data.short_description: The beautiful soundtrack for Jeebo & Jerbo vs. The Wall composed by Isaiah Prewitt. Includes 13 original songs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 700 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Some of the music in this video game uses sounds created by SF, Chris Owl Alvarez, Mikolis, Ones & Zeros and Isaiah Prewitt, derived from the Helm Synthesizer by Matt Tytel. Some of these sounds have been altered from their original state. These sounds are licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.
